heading: HB00534
0: AN ACT PROVIDING ADDITIONAL BENEFITS AND PRIVILEGES TO SENIOR CITIZENS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7432, AS AMENDED, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO MAXIMIZE THE CONTRIBUTION OF SENIOR CITIZENS TO NATION-BUILDING, GRANT BENEFITS AND SPECIAL PRIVILEGES AND FOR OTHER PUROSES"
status: Pending with the Committee on POPULATION AND FAMILY RELATIONS since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00534
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING ADDITIONAL BENEFITS AND PRIVILEGES TO SENIOR CITIZENS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7432, AS AMENDED, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO MAXIMIZE THE CONTRIBUTION OF SENIOR CITIZENS TO NATION-BUILDING, GRANT BENEFITS AND SPECIAL PRIVILEGES AND FOR OTHER PUROSES"
ABSTRACT : Gives highest priority to the elderly to live their lives to the fullest in comfort and worry-free environment.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GONZAGA, RUWEL PETER S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
